entry.title: The Next Portal? BlockGames Airdrop Farming Takes Over Crypto Twitter
entry.summary: BLOCK this and BLOCK that—will Crypto Twitter users block each other over BlockGames’ airdrop farming push?

entry.title: Bored Apes and Other Yuga Ethereum NFTs Are Shedding Value—Why?
entry.summary: Even amid the returning bull market, the Bored Ape Yacht Club and other Yuga Labs NFT projects on Ethereum are losing steam.

entry.title: Bitcoin Developers Unite to Draft Guidelines for BRC-20 Tokens
entry.summary: The Layer 1 Foundation rallied a coalition to prevent schisms over the standard behind the popular Ordinals project.

entry.title: Bitcoin Is Headed for $150K, Say Bernstein Analysts
entry.summary: AllianceBernstein says these are “still early days” and that the already massive inflows point to a coming surge in price.

entry.title: Wormhole Explains Why Some Users Are Getting More Airdrop Tokens Than Others
entry.summary: Who’s getting the bulk of W tokens and why do Mad Lads NFT holders get 8x the tokens of DeGods? Wormhole explains.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Stock Soars 14% as Saylor Buys More Bitcoin
entry.summary: The Monday spike has settled to a more modest 4% daily gain, but if you bought MSTR back in 2020, you’d still be up nearly 1,000%.

entry.title: You Can Now Earn Bitcoin for Playing Sudoku—Here's How Much
entry.summary: Bling Financial’s free-to-play Bitcoin Sudoku on iOS and Android lets you earn BTC or Ethereum by solving puzzles.

entry.title: VanEck Lowers Bitcoin ETF Fees to Zero, Undercutting BlackRock
entry.summary: Looking for a competitive edge, VanEck is temporarily eliminating fees for its Bitcoin ETF offering.

entry.title: Ready Player One-Inspired Metaverse Shares First Look at Battle Royale Game
entry.summary: The Readyverse, based on the “Ready Player One” book and film, offers a first tease of a battle royale game called Open.

entry.title: Why Analysts Are Bullish on the Ethereum Dencun Upgrade
entry.summary: Protodanksharding will usher in much lower fees for Ethereum L2s and may allow ETH to outshine its competitors this year.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF Surge Leads Crypto Funds to Record-Breaking $2.7 Billion in Weekly Gains
entry.summary: Investors continue to plug cash into spot Bitcoin ETFs and other crypto products, yielding a record-breaking week.

entry.title: Ethereum Dencun Upgrade Is This Week—Here's What to Expect
entry.summary: A word of caution for Ethereum upgrade first-timers: There's nothing that users need to do. Be wary of blogs, emails, or X posts that say otherwise.

entry.title: Trump Now Says He Has 'Fun' With Bitcoin and 'Crazy New Currencies'
entry.summary: Former U.S. President Trump also warned that countries adopting crypto over a dollar standard could spell doom for the United States.

entry.title: MapleStory Universe Moves to Avalanche as Gaming Giant Nexon Splits With Polygon
entry.summary: The MapleStory MMO franchise will launch on an Avalanche subnet instead of Ethereum scaler Polygon, as originally announced.

entry.title: BTC HITS 70K!
entry.summary: ETF net inflows hit $472m in strong week. GBTC outflows hit $10bn, nearly overtaken by new 9. BlackRock to allow more funds to buy BTC ETFs. Rumours still of Qatar buying amid Bukele meeting.

entry.title: MicroStrategy 205,000 Bitcoin Treasury Is Bigger Than All Other BTC Treasuries Combined
entry.summary: "We're buying it to hold it 100 years. That $66K to $16K crash—that shook out the tourists," said MicroStrategy founder and chairman Michael Saylor.

entry.title: Why the Bitcoin Halving Is Sooner Than You Think
entry.summary: It has to do with the Bitcoin network's finite block space and the fact that the halving is scheduled to occur at an exact block height—not a date.

entry.title: Bitcoin Flips Silver as It Breaks Above $71,000 for First Time Ever
entry.summary: It's a milestone that Bitcoin has seen often since the beginning of March. It was only Friday afternoon when Bitcoin broke above $70,000 for the first time ever.

entry.title: This Week in Crypto Games: Saga Airdrop, Notcoin Trading, and PlayStation NFT Plans
entry.summary: Catch up on this week’s biggest crypto and NFT gaming news and find some weekend reads in our latest roundup.

entry.title: Gaming Tokens Gala, Pixels, and Ronin Skyrocket as Bitcoin Price Hits $70,000
entry.summary: Pixels, Parallel, and Beam all set new peak prices this weekend as Gala, Ronin, and others outpace Bitcoin’s own gains.

entry.title: Dystopian Thriller RZR Shines Bright in Los Angeles
entry.summary: Our review and interview featuring David Bianchi's Web3 cyberpunk series, which had a sneak-peek screening in L.A.

entry.title: Coinbase Met With SEC Over Grayscale's Proposed Ethereum ETF
entry.summary: Federal filings reveal that the exchange gave a presentation to Wall Street's top regulator.

entry.summary: With both major and minor coins hitting new highs, giddy mayhem is quickly becoming the mood of the moment.

entry.summary: Bitcoin wasn't the only digital asset making shockwaves this week.

entry.title: Here's Every Upcoming Marvel Game You Shouldn't Miss
entry.summary: Ready for your next Marvel gaming fix after the stellar Spider-Man 2? You're in luck: Many more games are coming. Here's the full list.

entry.title: Marilyn Monroe to Be Resurrected With ‘Biological AI’
entry.summary: San Francisco-based Soul Machines brings the Hollywood star to digital life as an interactive avatar.

entry.title: Sam Altman Restored to OpenAI Board as Investigation Into His Ouster Concludes
entry.summary: The CEO is back on the company Board of Directors along with three new members as an investigation prompts corporate governance changes.

entry.title: Coinbase-Backed $85 Million Crypto Super PAC Sets Its Sights on Senate Races
entry.summary: Fairshake PAC will target key general elections and primaries in four states that could reshape the Senate’s makeup.

entry.title: 'Assassin's Creed' Maker Ubisoft Just Joined Another Crypto Gaming Network
entry.summary: Ubisoft is the most active gaming giant playing in the blockchain world, and it will serve as a validator for yet another network.

entry.title: Game On: The Hottest Upcoming Gaming Token Airdrops
entry.summary: UPDATED: The Saga airdrop is underway, but there are still opportunities to earn in games like Nifty Island, BloodLoop, Notcoin, and more.

entry.title: Bitcoin Gained 10% This Week—These Altcoins Flew Even Higher
entry.summary: The price of BTC briefly hit a new all-time high—again. But other digital assets are yielding even bigger profits.

entry.title: Biden Targets AI Deepfakes in State of the Union, Pushes for Stronger Privacy Laws
entry.summary: President Joe Biden addresses the need to regulate artificial intelligence, including a ban on AI voice impersonations, during his State of the Union speech.

entry.title: Live With Raoul Pal
entry.summary: SOL up 10%, Pantera raising $250m to buy from FTX. Market flat but spot buyers begin to drive volumes.

entry.title: Streamlining Blockchain: Demystifying Real-Time Insights & Simplifying Data Management
entry.summary: Discover how to navigate and overcome the complexities of blockchain data management with QuickNode’s Streams. This webinar, guided by our seasoned experts Nick Yushkevich and Carl DiClementi, provides you with actionable insights into tackling common challenges faced by businesses in the blockchain space. From real-time data streaming that ensures timely decision-making to robust error handling mechanisms that guarantee data integrity, and comprehensive observability features that offer deep insights into your blockchain operations, we’ll cover how QuickNode’s infrastructure is tailored to enhance operational efficiency, scalability, and innovation.

entry.title: DOGS ON TOP!
entry.summary: ETFs see another $562m net inflow. Fear & Greed hits 90, was above for months in 2021. ETH leads majors, beta-plays take lead in altcoins. BlackRock to start buying BTC in its largest fund. MicroStrategy plans $600m capital raise to buy BTC. BTC flips market cap of Silver. WIF to be listed on Binance, rises 20%. PEPE & WIF mentioned on Bloomberg. Alien Punk sells for $16m, ‘NFTs not dead’. 3 more large NFT sales for $500K.

entry.title: Interview: How SocialFi Will Transform Crypto Farming Game 'Pixels'
entry.summary: Pixels founder Luke Barwikowski joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss how the Ronin-based farming game will be transformed through the addition of guilds and changes to resource generation. They also discuss his ultimate vision for Pixels and his team. Note: This interview was recorded shortly before the PIXEL token launch.

entry.title: Orangie Plays the 'Otherside' Apes Come Home Game Event With His Bored Ape
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie checked out the limited-time "Apes Come Home" event in Otherside, the Bored Ape metaverse game, and got to use his own Ape avatar. Was it worth the $75K he spent for the NFT? Check out his impressions of the experience.

entry.title: 'This is the Age of Creators': How DASTAN is Fixing the 'Broken' Media Industry
entry.summary: Following the launch of decentralized media publishing company DASTAN, its President Farokh Sarmad, CEO Loxley Fernandes, and COO Quinn Button, Ph. D joined Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz and The Nifty & BoDoggos Founder and Partner Easy to talk about the future of media.

entry.title: Inside The Mind Of a Web3 Gamer
entry.summary: Saro McKenna, Co-Founder of Alien Worlds, Linda Ang, Head of Strategy at Aelf, and Sami Chlagou, CEO of Cross the Ages joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to explore the profile of the Web3 gamer, the evolving landscape of Web3 gaming and the transition between Web2 and Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Casper Network: Opening a 'New World of Possibilities' Beyond Enterprise Users
entry.summary: Casper Network's Director of Ecosystem Alizee Carli and Head of Content Joe Benso join Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about how the Layer 1 blockchain is expanding beyond its enterprise user base to Web3-native projects.

entry.title: VanEck Web3 Lead: Tokenized Real Estate the 'Holy Grail'
entry.summary: VanEck's Head of NFT Community and Web3, Matt Bartlett, joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss the launch of its new NFT platform Segment.io, and the need for regulatory clarity in the NFT space.

entry.title: Orangie Plays 'Dookey Dash: Unclogged,' the Bored Ape Game With Over $1 Million in Prizes
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie shares a first look at an early version of Dookey Dash: Unclogged, the new free-to-play version of 2023's crypto gaming sensation. Yuga Labs is releasing the new version of the game this spring with over $1 million in prizes up for grabs.

entry.title: How Paris Saint-Germain FC Joined Chiliz as a Validator
entry.summary: Chiliz Chief Strategy Officer Max Rabinovitch joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss Paris Saint-Germain FC joining its network as a validator, and how consequential Web3 adoption in sport will come from the grassroots.

entry.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sébastien Borget: 'The Future of Gaming is User-Generated Content'
entry.summary: Sébastien Borget, COO and co-founder of The Sandbox, joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the metaverse platform's launch of user-generated content, AI in gaming, and open metaverse standards.

entry.title: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus: How Web3 Filmmaking is 'Taking the Castle'
entry.summary: Miguel Faus, director of NFT-funded feature film "Calladita," joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the film's recent premiere and how the "radically independent" decentralized Film3 movement is evolving.

entry.title: Pudgy Penguins Teams Up With Unstoppable Domains
entry.summary: Pudgy Penguins CEO Luca Netz and Unstoppable Domains COO Sandy Carter joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the launch of the NFT collection's .pudgy domains, its second line of toys at Walmat, and the upcoming launch of the Pudgy World game.

entry.title: Improbable Chief Product Officer: Web3 Games Need to Put Experience, Game Logic Onchain
entry.summary: Improbable's Rob Whitehead joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the metaverse technology firm's collaborations with blue-chip NFT collections, and how adding tens of thousands of players to a game will work in practice.

entry.title: Ledger: 'Probably Five Years' Before Phones With Fully Integrated Hardware Wallets
entry.summary: Ledger's Chief Experience Officer Ian Rogers sat down with Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk security, hacks, and where the current generation of smartphone crypto wallets fall short.

entry.title: What Is Notcoin? Co-Creator Sasha Plotvinov Explains the Viral Telegram Game and Token
entry.summary: Notcoin, a simple clicker-style game within messaging app Telegram, has racked up over 25 million players since the start of 2024 and plans to convert the trillions of virtual coins mined so far into a real crypto token on The Open Network. Open Builders founder Sasha Plotvinov joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to explain the viral phenomenon.

entry.title: 'Pixels' Founder Luke Barwikowski on the Game's Wild Rise and Ronin Move
entry.summary: Ahead of the PIXEL token launch, Pixels game founder Luke Barwikowski joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the hectic last few months—and why the game migrated between Ethereum scaling networks, from Polygon to Ronin.

entry.title: How Arbitrum Won the 'ApeChain' Vote for an ApeCoin Ethereum Scaler
entry.summary: Offchain Labs co-founder and CEO Steven Goldfeder joined Rug Radio's "FOMO Hour" to discuss the ApeCoin DAO's vote to create an Ethereum layer-2 gaming network on Arbitrum for the Bored Ape Yacht Club ecosystem.
